Instalment Finance for your clients

Give your clients the opportunity to have their appointment now, but pay later. Pay in 4. No interest. No fees.

The benefits

Increase client bookings

Zip is proven to attract new clients, increase their appointments and repeat visits

No risk

You get paid upfront. All credit dicisions and risk sit with Zip

Simple set-up

15 minutes of training and you are ready to go

How it works

Step one

Confirm appointment with client, introduce Zip as a payment option

Step two

Client applies on their mobile, and authorises payment securely. - takes 2 minutes

Step three

We pay for the client's appointment with payment direct to you

Step four

Client proceeds with appointment and they pay us back - Pay in 4. No interest. No fees
